title: MSBuild should indicate if the binary logger is enabled
body:
<!-- This is a template that helps us provide quicker feedback. Please use any relevant sections and delete anything you don't need. -->

# Feature Request
<!--
* Please include a clear and concise description of the problem.
-->

Static graph-based restore needs to run out-of-proc and so it has its own binary logger.  When users specify `/binarylogger` to MSBuild.exe, there is currently no way for static graph-based restore to detect that the binary logger is enabled and automatically emit a binlog for restore.  The binary logger sets some environment variables already, it might as well set one more indicating that the current build episode is using the binary logger.
